that you can run inside of terminal and when you run it effectively
nothing changes you just get into another space depending on how you have it configured but now you have these

is uh caps lock a or control a and then pipe and that would open a vertical

it does not actually install any of the LSPs for you those are separate things usually like node modules that you have
